name: 鄭辰仰
consultation: Please check course information on i-School+ portal and/or contact the lecturer (cycheng@ntut.edu.tw)
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG2：消除飢餓（Zero Hunger）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）
remarks: Due to online teaching being implemented for weeks 17 and 18, the book report discussions for this semester will consist of journal presentations by students, which are expected to be uploaded to the platform. We plan to conduct discussions on master's thesis research in the LINE group.
